features.name: Morning & Evening Check-in
features.notes: 5-step AM + 5-step PM flow with meds step, fully API-connected

features.name: Detailed Symptom Log
features.notes: 5-step wizard (symptoms → severity → mood → triggers → note). Severity UI matches morning check-in with Mild/Moderate/Severe per symptom

features.name: Home Dashboard
features.notes: Readiness score with activity recommendation, 7-day strip, morning/evening check-in CTA, editable sleep, meds, journal card

features.name: Insights & Patterns
features.notes: Pattern detection, correlations, benchmark comparisons. Morning/evening completion tracking. Report moved to settings

features.name: Journal
features.notes: Landing screen with week overview, links to calendar and symptom log. View full week routes to calendar

features.name: Medications
features.notes: Add/edit/delete meds, daily tracking, adherence view. Custom time/frequency, clearable type selection, SMS phone field, reordered tabs (Current first)

features.name: SOS Breathing
features.notes: Animated breathing exercise, saves events to API. Reusable (state resets on done). Hot flash logging posts directly to /api/logs

features.name: Calendar View
features.notes: Month view with AM/PM dots, 45-day range

features.name: Learn / Articles
features.notes: Article list + reader. Emoji placeholders for thumbnails

features.name: Profile & Settings
features.notes: View/edit profile. No PUT endpoint for partial updates

features.name: Authentication
features.notes: Clerk auth with email + Apple Sign-In

features.name: Onboarding
features.notes: 12 onboarding screens, saves profile at completion

features.name: Export Data
features.notes: UI built with PDF/CSV options. No actual export generation backend

features.name: Legal Pages
features.notes: Static content. Medical Disclaimer & SMS Terms routes are null

features.name: Help & Feedback
features.notes: FAQ and feedback form UI, no submission backend

features.name: Paywall / Subscriptions
features.notes: Backend has RevenueCat webhook + subscription check. No paywall screen in app

features.name: Push Notifications
features.notes: Token registration + cron job work. No user-facing settings screen

features.name: Wearables / Health Sync
features.notes: DB schema exists (healthData table). No endpoints, no screen

features.name: Report Builder
features.notes: In wireframe spec. No screen, no endpoint

features.name: QR Code Funnel
features.notes: Wireframe spec has 6 screens. Not started

features.name: Custom Tracking
features.notes: DB has customSymptoms field in profiles. No dedicated screen

features.name: Programs / Lessons
features.notes: DB has programProgress table. No endpoints, no screens
